relating to a person's sexual desire (= feeling of wanting something): Freud pointed out that libidinal drives can conflict with the conventions of civilized behaviour. He is incapable of controlling his impulses, especially the libidinal ones. Related word
libido

The work of the modernists explodes with a libidinal, swashbuckling energy, unbounded by the constraints of realism. As a drama it is libidinal, visually appealing, and utterly compelling.
